page.title: 06LOCAL CLUBS IN ILMINGTON
page.content: {Ilmington}is fortunate in having a good{playing field}which caters for hockey,football,cricket,tennis and bowls.On the{playing field}there is a childrens' playground area with swings,a slide,a sandpit and other apparatus.A modern{pavilion}provides all facilities.There are{clubs}for each sport which anyone can join.A Brownie pack has recently been formed and there are opportunities to join cubs,scouts or guides nearby.The{ {village hall,school}and the three{ {churches}serve as centres for the whole community.The{Womens'Institute} is now thriving and it takes an active part in all local functions.The{Parish {Council}is lively,active and it encourages the holding of fetes and flower shows.{Local pubs} provide darts clubs and domino clubs.
